name: Royal Dutch Grain and Feed Trade Association (Het Comité)
goal: The Royal Dutch Grain and Feed Trade Association (‘Het Comité’) is a trade organisation representing the interests of its approximately 150 members in the agri-business. Its activities also include compiling and managing standard national and international trade contracts, operating an arbitration institute, organising an annual course in grain trading and setting day values
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Food Safety, Internal Market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Trade Policies
- Food & Feed Safety issues
- Sustainable development
